name: Blackhole on the Road
description:
Blackhole on the Road is a thrilling game that puts you in control of a powerful black hole as you compete against others to become the largest and most powerful in the city.

Your mission is to accumulate as many points as possible by swallowing everything in sight, including traffic lights, cars, and even buildings!
As you consume objects, your black hole will grow in size, allowing you to swallow larger and more valuable targets.

The competition heats up as you encounter other black holes in the city, each vying for dominance and supremacy. Use your size and power to your advantage, swallowing smaller black holes to increase your own mass and strength.Blackhole on the Road is a game that requires strategy and quick reflexes, as you navigate the city and avoid obstacles while consuming everything in sight.

So, join the competition and become the most powerful black hole in the city!

Game Features :
- Limited time
- Table with results
- Skin shop
